about_the_game:
Flesh Psychosis is a casual puzzle game, in which you have to choose which ingredients to put in the funnel to cook deathly meals. Be careful what you concoct to make the best score !

Help Madline, the Crazy Villainess, to make the most destructive meal to give to her enemies, following spooky recipes.

You will be able to use different actions during each turn, and try to gain points while droping Madline health to zero each time objects fall in the funnel.

If you gain enough score during a round you gain a level, and can choose between various upgrades.

Make recipes in your evil kitchen !
